steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I save `content` attribute value of element located `elementName(version):a` to ((story)) variable `ui-version`

scenarios.title: check insights page left panel

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `/insights`
When I change context to element located `testId(jnj-left-side-bar)`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-insights-left-bar-default` using screenshot configuration:
|shootingStrategy|cutRight               |
|SIMPLE          |${context-x-coordinate}|

scenarios.title: check insights page central panel

steps.value: When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-left-side-bar']/following-sibling::*)`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-insights` ignoring:［
|ELEMENT                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|By.xpath(//*[contains(text(),'Cases')]/following-sibling::*), By.xpath(//*[contains(text(),'Cases')]/../following-sibling::*), By.xpath(//*[text()='Number of cases']/../../following-sibling::*)|］

scenarios.title: selected filter value is displayed in the main area

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-filter-button-procedure-filter)`
When I save number of elements located `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*)` to ((SCENARIO)) variable `options`
Given I initialize ((SCENARIO)) variable `selected-option` with value `#{generate(regexify '[2-${options}]')}`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[${selected-option}])`
When I save text of context element to ((SCENARIO)) variable `selected-text`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@role='radiogroup']/child::*[${selected-option}])`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-apply-button-action-panel)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-apply-button-action-panel)` disappears
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-main-content)`
